pageContent: Hotel Azure Dream is a 3-star luxury resort located on the coast of a fictional Azure Bay. It features 120 ocean-view rooms, 3 restaurants, a spa, an infinity pool, and a private beach. The hotel offers premium services such as personal butlers, yacht tours, and helicopter transfers

Hotel Azure Dream offers three types of rooms: Standard (30m², king bed, balcony), Deluxe (40m², ocean view, private jacuzzi), and Royal Suite (100m², 2 bedrooms, living room, sea panorama). All rooms include air conditioning, smart TV, minibar, and daily housekeeping.
Guests can enjoy various activities such as yoga classes, diving tours, wine tastings, and sunset cruises. The hotel also offers a kids' club and a wellness center.
For reservations or inquiries, call +123 456 123 or email info@azuredream.fake. Address: Azure Bay, Dreamland Island, Fiction Country.

Azure Dream features three on-site restaurants: Ocean Pearl (seafood fine dining), Terra Bistro (international cuisine), and SkyBar (cocktails and tapas on the rooftop). Room service is available 24/7.
